column1: They can include: - Abdominal pain - Nausea - Vomiting - Diarrhea The person may also have a fever.

- Chest x-ray - EKG (electrocardiogram or heart tracing) - Fluids through a vein (by IV) - Laxatives to move the poison quickly through the body and remove it - Medicines to treat symptoms and reverse the effects of the poison
